availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Long (Christian County, Kentucky, lime burner.)

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, lime burner. Kentucky native. Father of Resina Long, Martha Long, and Betty Long. Married to Margaret Anderson Long in Christian County, Kentucky, on September 1, 1859. Lime burner in Christian County, Kentucky, in 1860. Convicted of assaulting Louis Kistler in Christian County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, Hopkinsville, p. 672.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994031, Christian County Marriages, p. 37.
